headline.main: Liver Transplant Surgical Pioneer Dr. Thomas Starzl Dies
headline.print_headline: Liver Transplant Surgical Pioneer Dr. Thomas Starzl Dies

lead_paragraph: Dr. Thomas Starzl, who pioneered liver transplant surgery in the 1960s and was a leading researcher into anti-rejection drugs, has died. He was 90.
snippet: Dr. Thomas Starzl, who pioneered liver transplant surgery in the 1960s and was a leading researcher into anti-rejection drugs, has died. He was 90....
